Further advance obtain good product ovarian stimulation lead production recombinant FSH ( follitropin alpha ) fill mass preparation . This hormone become consistent precise gonadotropin due improvement quantification process . Today , despite accurate modern tool ovulation induction , daily practice , doctor continue `` fight '' two old problem assist reproduction : multiple pregnancy ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) . Application assist reproduction technique ( ARTs ) use medication induce ovulation , risk produce gestation multiple birth higher frequency observe spontaneous gestation .
